name: HalfordHoopsRadio
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen for daily quotes, deals, giveaways, and advice from one of the best basketball trainers in the world, Skyler Halford. Once you've added this Alexa Skill you can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" and then you can get in on all the tips, tricks, quotes, and giveaways!

Giveaways include gift cards, free and discounted products, motivational quotes, and inspirational talks from Skyler to get your day headed in the right direction!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
